entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 05:48 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.5°C
Wind: SE 24 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers at times heavy. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thundershower late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm except 20 mm in the heaviest showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 early this morning. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
